post.body: - can you remotely control iTunes with your iTouch? boo yAH!
i thought u had a plow?
how much snow? None here.
ok. Why maybe the last time?
I blundered into that too when I put the phone down once and noticed the display changed. Now I try that with all the apps.
looking crushed velvety http://snipurl.com/8xvrs
For me, the Momberger party is THE holiday party of the season outside of family. Do I need to boy up?
Oh yea. Looking forward to it.
2nd pan of baklava in the oven. Had to teach my cuz what baking cups were.
I have been in the house all day doing holiday stuff, I haven't noticed the temp drop. Thanks to twitter...
Note to self - if you want something done in a timely fashion; do it yourself.
Gahhhh ran out of nuts. More on the way.
Of course butter is good for you. http://snipurl.com/8yzeh
Making baklava for holiday treats. Did you make the baklava list this year?
2008 Xmas presents wrapping. Done.
Wrapping Xmas gifts and watching the Stillers.
Home safe. Kettle on the boil. Good night with friends. Excellent food and even better desserts.
Rock Band with @therascalking and friends.
Tasting some good Momberger beer
Off to the @therascalking Holiday Party. ho ho ho
